Born in 2019, PolarB has travelled around the globe, meeting children in 60+ countries. As a young wooden toy brand, PolarB combines modern design (soft colours and lovely animals) with classic educational functions.
The Best of PolarB range has been specially selected by us to include over 30 new lines and includes toys for role-play, construction, imaginative play, as well as infant toys and activity centres.
